constituent: alms, banner, direction, compass, direction, reclining, lying down, scorpion
koohiiStory1: Under their banner, volunteers are requesting alms for scorpion sting victims.
koohiiStory2: ALMS for the poor cries the beggar under his tattered BANNER. An evil bastard instead drops a SCORPION into his begging bowl.
readingExamples: 施設 (しせつ), 施政 (しせい), 実施 (じっし), 施す (ほどこ.す)
words: to donate, to give, to conduct, to apply, to perform
enforcement, enact, put into practice, carry out, operation
